data.name: Virtual Aquarium - DLC Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
DLC Pack 1 includes:
4 x Parrot fish:
Green Bicolour Parrotfish
Rainbow Bicolour Parrotfish
Stoplight parrotfish
Blue Bicolour Parrotfish

2x Lion fish:
Red Lion Fish
Gray Lion Fish

4x Betta fish:
Red Bettafish
Pink Bettafish
Green Bettafish
Purple Bettafish

4x Clown fish:
Orange Clownfish
Gold Nugget Maroon Clownfish
Clark's Anemonefish
Electric Blue Clownfish

Improved fish food that makes them grow 2 times faster
Unlocked Screensaver
Water effect on screen unlocked

data.short_description: The DLC Pack is an extension to Virtual Aquarium - Overlay Desktop Game. Includes additional content.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
